JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Corneliu Bîrsan;Egbert Myjer;Elisabet Fura;Josep Casadevall
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE district of the province of GPE . He was represented before the Court by PERSON , a lawyer practising in ORG . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant was taken into police custody by police officers from ORG of ORG on suspicion of membership of the ORG ( Workers’ ORG ) , an illegal organisation .

On DATE ORG remanded him in custody . The public prosecutor filed a bill of indictment with ORG charging the applicant , LAW of LAW , with membership of a terrorist organisation and with having been engaged in acts aimed at the secession of a part of the territory of the ORG .
On DATE ORG commenced proceedings against the applicant and CARDINAL other suspects .

On DATE GPE ’s ORG amended LAW and excluded military members from ORG . Following similar amendments made on DATE to the PERSON on ORG , the military judge sitting on ORG hearing the applicant ’s case was replaced by a civilian judge .
At the hearing of DATE the military judge sitting on the bench of ORG was replaced by a civilian judge .

On DATE ORG found the applicant guilty as charged and sentenced him to life imprisonment . The applicant appealed against the judgment . The applicant ’s representative asked the appeal court to hold a hearing , which was granted .
On DATE ORG , after hearing the applicant ’s representative , closed the hearing and informed the parties that judgment would be pronounced on DATE .
At the hearing of DATE ORG pronounced its judgment upholding ORG judgment . The applicant ’s representative did not attend the hearing .
On DATE ORG judgment was placed in ORG .
On DATE the applicant ’s representative requested a copy of the final judgment from ORG ; it was given to him on DATE .
